page.title: 08HOBBIES OF BODFARI CHILDREN
page.content: The hobbies and pastimes of the children in school are many and varied.They include sporting interests such as football, rugby and swimming. Many children belong to Denbigh Swimming Club. Music plays an important part in many children's pastimes.Recorder lessons are given at school, and children receive private tuition in cello, piano, cornet,clarinet and guitar.Some children are considering joining the recently formed Denbigh Schools Orchestra. Since this is a rural area the pastimes of horseriding,sailing, shooting and fishing are very popular.Some of the above events are combined to form the popular event of tetrathlon.
